pr_title: Make LDAP PM conditonal on property

timeline.message: Make LDAP PM conditonal on property

timeline.bodyText:
This will not work. The setting is defined as cas.authn.pm.ldap[x].ldapUrl in master.
To make things consistent between master and 6.1, I suggest that if an LDAP url is not defined, a new BeanCreationException should be thrown instead, rather than ignoring the configuration silently.
timeline.author: mmoayyed

replies.author: leleuj

replies.bodyText: Good point. You're right. To handle this then, it think we need a custom condition with a conditional annotation to loop through the collection of ldaps and skip bean creation if none is defined.
replies.author: mmoayyed

replies.bodyText: OK. I'll re-work on that next Tuesday.
replies.author: leleuj

replies.bodyText: In fact, after a few tests, I found out a very simple solution to check the whole property name.
replies.author: leleuj
